GSD.description:
ext2: Use kvmalloc() for group descriptor array

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit b9b5560b342e40bd6a0a131fb1bd99684ee8f1e7. For more details please see the references link.
